publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4628 Michael Matheson: Falkirk Council Backtracks over Single Status Pay Protection—That the Parliament condemns the decision of Falkirk Council to reduce single status pay protection from four to three years; considers that some of the lowest paid employees of Falkirk Council will lose out financially because of this decision, and calls on the Labour/Conservative-led council to reinstate the position of the previous SNP-led council and offer four years’ pay protection.
